home.title: Transparent & Verifiable Disaster Relief Funding on Algorand
home.hero_description_1: Help families affected by monsoon floods rebuild their lives
home.hero_description_2: Support education initiatives in remote tribal areas of India
home.hero_description_3: Provide water and food security for drought-affected communities
home.why_impactx_desc: Our platform ensures every rupee reaches those who need it most through transparent, verifiable processes
home.feature_transparency_desc: All donations and fund releases are recorded on the Algorand blockchain for complete transparency.
home.feature_verification_desc: Proof of aid delivery verified by multiple oracles (drones, satellites, IoT) with weighted voting.
home.feature_storage_desc: Proof documents stored securely on IPFS with hashes anchored to the blockchain.
home.feature_india_desc: Specifically designed for Indian disaster relief scenarios with local language support.
home.disaster_relief_desc: View active campaigns and relief efforts across different regions of India
home.partners_desc: Collaborating with national organizations for effective disaster response
home.how_it_works_desc: Our 4-step process ensures transparency and accountability in every donation
home.step_create_desc: NGOs create disaster relief campaigns with detailed information
home.step_donate_desc: Donors contribute funds to secure blockchain escrow
home.step_verify_desc: Oracles verify proof of aid delivery using multiple sources
home.step_release_desc: Funds released to NGO upon successful verification
home.cta_desc: Join thousands of donors who trust ImpactX to ensure their contributions reach those in need
home.disaster_types_desc: Understanding the most frequent natural disasters affecting India
home.disaster_flood_desc: Heavy monsoon rains cause flooding in low-lying areas, affecting millions of people annually.
home.disaster_earthquake_desc: India's location on seismic zones makes it prone to earthquakes, especially in the Himalayan region.
home.disaster_cyclone_desc: The Bay of Bengal and Arabian Sea generate cyclones that hit India's eastern and western coasts.
home.disaster_drought_desc: Extended periods of below-average rainfall lead to water scarcity and crop failure.
home.disaster_landslide_desc: Hilly terrains are susceptible to landslides during heavy rains and earthquakes.
home.disaster_fire_desc: Dry weather and forest conditions contribute to wildfires, particularly in mountainous regions.
home.disaster_flood_prep1: Move to higher ground immediately when flood warnings are issued
home.disaster_flood_prep2: Keep emergency supplies like food, water, and medicines ready
home.disaster_flood_prep3: Avoid walking or driving through flood waters
home.disaster_earthquake_prep1: Drop, cover, and hold on during shaking
home.disaster_earthquake_prep2: Secure heavy furniture and appliances to walls
home.disaster_earthquake_prep3: Identify safe spots in each room of your home
home.disaster_cyclone_prep1: Reinforce doors and windows with storm shutters or plywood
home.disaster_cyclone_prep2: Trim trees and remove dead branches near your house
home.disaster_cyclone_prep3: Keep a battery-powered radio for emergency broadcasts
home.disaster_drought_prep1: Conserve water by fixing leaks and using efficient appliances
home.disaster_drought_prep3: Store water in clean containers for emergency use
home.disaster_landslide_prep1: Avoid building on steep slopes and unstable terrain
home.disaster_landslide_prep2: Install proper drainage systems around your property
home.disaster_landslide_prep3: Be aware of changes in hillside vegetation or cracks in walls
home.disaster_fire_prep1: Clear dry leaves and debris from around your property
home.disaster_fire_prep2: Create a fire-resistant zone around your home
home.disaster_fire_prep3: Have an evacuation plan and emergency kit ready
home.disaster_preparedness_desc: Create an emergency kit with essential supplies, develop a family communication plan, and stay informed about local disaster risks and warnings.
home.disaster_statistics_desc: Floods and droughts are the most frequent natural disasters in India, affecting millions of people annually. Earthquakes and cyclones, while less frequent, have severe impacts. Fire incidents show high frequency but relatively lower impact on population.

accessibility.reading_mode_desc: Optimize text layout for better readability
accessibility.tts_instructions: Select any text on the page to hear it read aloud. Adjust the speech rate to your preference.

preparednessTips.title: Disaster Preparedness Tips
preparednessTips.tip1: Keep an emergency kit with essential supplies
preparednessTips.tip1Desc: Prepare a kit with water, non-perishable food, flashlights, batteries, first aid supplies, medications, and important documents. Store it in an easily accessible location.
preparednessTips.tip2: Stay informed about weather conditions and warnings
preparednessTips.tip2Desc: Monitor local news, weather forecasts, and emergency alerts. Sign up for emergency notification systems in your area. Download weather apps with push notifications.
preparednessTips.tip3: Have an evacuation plan and practice it regularly
preparednessTips.tip3Desc: Create a family evacuation plan that includes multiple escape routes, meeting points, and communication strategies. Practice this plan twice a year with all household members.
preparednessTips.tip4: Know the location of emergency shelters in your area
preparednessTips.tip4Desc: Identify the nearest emergency shelters, hospitals, and evacuation routes from your home and workplace. Keep a printed map in your emergency kit.

emergencyContacts.title: Emergency Contacts
emergencyContacts.noContactsFound: No emergency contacts found for the selected state.
emergencyContacts.selectStateMessage: Please select a state to view emergency contacts.

weatherAlerts.title: Weather Alerts
weatherAlerts.noAlertsDesc: There are currently no weather alerts for your region.
weatherAlerts.floodWarningDesc: Heavy rainfall expected in the region. Avoid low-lying areas.
weatherAlerts.cycloneWatchDesc: Cyclonic conditions developing over the Arabian Sea.
weatherAlerts.heatwaveWarningDesc: Extreme heat conditions. Stay hydrated and avoid outdoor activities.
weatherAlerts.safetyTipDesc: Stay informed about weather conditions in your area. Sign up for local weather alerts and have an emergency plan ready.

disasterRisk.title: Disaster Risk Assessment
disasterRisk.tip1: Develop and practice emergency evacuation plans
disasterRisk.tip2: Maintain emergency supply kits with essential items
disasterRisk.tip3: Stay informed about local disaster risks and warnings
disasterRisk.tip4: Invest in structural improvements to withstand disasters

resourceAllocator.title: Emergency Resource Allocator
resourceAllocator.note: Note: These calculations are estimates based on standard disaster management protocols and should be adjusted based on specific local conditions.

impactAssessment.title: Disaster Impact Assessment
impactAssessment.selectDisasterAndRegion: Select a disaster type and region to view impact assessment

responsePlanner.title: Disaster Response Planner
responsePlanner.selectDisasterAndRegion: Select a disaster type, severity level, and region to generate a response plan

recoveryPlanner.title: Disaster Recovery Planner
recoveryPlanner.description: Plan and track the recovery process after a disaster to ensure effective rehabilitation and reconstruction.
recoveryPlanner.fillAllFields: Please fill in all fields to generate a recovery plan.

communityReporting.title: Community Disaster Reporting
communityReporting.description: Report disaster incidents in your community to help emergency responders and authorities respond quickly and effectively.
communityReporting.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the incident, affected areas, and any other relevant details...
communityReporting.mediaLimit: Maximum 5 files. Images and videos only.
communityReporting.successMessage: Your disaster report has been submitted successfully! Emergency responders have been notified.
communityReporting.submissionError: Failed to submit report. Please try again.
communityReporting.locationError: Unable to get your current location. Please enter location manually.
communityReporting.locationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.

volunteerCoordinator.title: Volunteer Coordinator
volunteerCoordinator.description: Coordinate volunteers for disaster response and recovery efforts

disasterStatistics.title: Disaster Statistics
disasterStatistics.description: Analyze and visualize disaster data and trends across India

fundingExchange.title: Funding Exchange
fundingExchange.subtitle: Multi-chain escrow system with transparent fund tracking
fundingExchange.algorandSdkPowered: Powered by Algorand SDK for secure multi-chain transactions
fundingExchange.rewardSystemDesc: Earn rewards for participating in the verification and reporting process
fundingExchange.balancingDesc: Our automated system ensures optimal fund distribution across chains for maximum efficiency

ivrSimulator.title: IVR Simulator
ivrSimulator.noActiveCall: No active call. Start a call to begin.
ivrSimulator.instructions: Press the numbers to navigate the IVR menu
ivrSimulator.description: The IVR (Interactive Voice Response) system allows users to interact with our emergency response services through voice commands and keypad inputs.
ivrSimulator.feature3: Integration with disaster reporting and emergency contacts
ivrSimulator.feature4: Seamless escalation to human operators when needed

ivrSystem.title: IVR Emergency Response System
ivrSystem.subtitle: Interactive Voice Response system for emergency communications and disaster response
ivrSystem.feature1Desc: Round-the-clock access to emergency services through a simple phone call, ensuring help is always available.
ivrSystem.feature2Desc: Support for multiple regional languages to ensure accessibility for all communities across India.
ivrSystem.feature3Desc: Instant response to emergency calls with automated routing to appropriate services based on caller input.
ivrSystem.feature4Desc: Integration with our disaster reporting system, emergency contacts, and volunteer coordination platforms.
ivrSystem.technicalDesc: Our IVR system is built on a robust cloud-based infrastructure that ensures high availability and scalability. The system is designed to handle thousands of concurrent calls during emergency situations.
